data.message: For all you dumb fucks stating he should not make rap political you obviously don't understand the original hip hop culture. It was and always has been political!! He's doing what he should be doing.  Go back and listen to NWA, Chuck D, Flava Flav, Marley Marl, Grandmaster flash etc! Old school, all of their music was political.  You so used to this watered down shit where everyone rhymes with the same word they just said that you don't have a clue! Shut up and go sit in a corner, you on punishment!

replies.message: I said it before and I'll say it again: the Trumpsters aren't the sharpest tools in the shed.
Neither are people who invent 20 genders, but don't mind me. I'm just scrollin the comments of what seems to be world war 3
Fuck Eminem he can suck a fucking hand grenade and die
Cunt wants to suck hillary Clinton's clit so be it loose your fans your old trash anyway
So rapping about raping your mother, being homophobic, and murdering your ex-wife is original hip-hop culture?  LOL right. Guess I missed something there.

Oh no, he's gonna quit rapping cuz some cunt named Oliver don't like him anymore,  but in the end he is worth more than 200 million and you probably sit at home and fantasize about sucking trumps dick while you cry
Can we get auto correct on her entire post?  Plz Siri, I will wait.
Sorry Christopher, I don't think Siri can dumb it down for you buddy.
100% yes to this
Annette as soon as we can get a translator in here to break down this ebonics ur speaking we might understand the message u were tying to convey. 😂
Most of these clowns aren't hip hop fans let alone Em fans. Their feelings got hurt because trump has a 29% approval rating and Em told him about his self and anyone who seems to blindly follow Trump

Anybody else remember NWA,Cypress Hill,Biggie,Pac,Melle Mel,etc blatantly TELLING FANS "FUCK YOU?"

*crickets*

Exactly. Always been a fan, hes a friggin genius...but fucking TELLING FANS FUCK YOU, How bout you fucking reimburse all those fans you just told to fuck off.....,fucking freedom of speech you preach yet if it aint your side you say fuck off and bye.

For this specific moment, FUCK you Marshall
Fk u Mike get the funk out of our country if you don't like it
Take your ass somewhere where you don't have freedom of speech and you would die for talking your crap
Maybe then you would appreciate what the forefathers did

Al, go fuck yourself Facebook mouth. Appreciate what our forefathers did? From a family of fucking vets of WW2 (grandfather), Korea (father) and numerous fucking things i do to support troops and our country....

Freedom of speech, your fuckin right...but its NOT freedom of speech when fucking liberal cunts bitch and cry when OPPOSING VIEWS 'have no right to say' whatever.

Fuckin cunt
Lmao, you're a fucking retard

But did he ever tell his fans they had to make a choice the way he did there? No...he always just beat down the person he was battling while leaving up to use to judge or love....now it's a with me or against me thing and that is new
Raps out
He dissed Clinton and Bush and it didn't offend me. This time he made it personal, so 🖕him.
Go watch diamond and silk
That's exactly it rap is about rising up and beating oppression that's It's origin these trump lovers probably only listen to white rappers fuck em they won't be missed
Thank you my beautiful sister

The difference between those other rappers is they didn't tell their fans to go fuck themselves. But to tell your fans to FU Becuase of who they voted for, is elementary school shit. Was excited to get your new album when it dropped but instead I'll just save that money and pick up a copy of vanilla ice. 🏊‍♀️
